comments.body: This is optional. The aim is to have only most recent files in the `MICRO_LOG_PATH`. Otherwise Renode will move the existing file to `logs.txt.1` (or `logs.txt.2` if it is taken etc.).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +51,55 @@# renode will do a log rotation and there will be multiple files such as
# $MICRO_LOG_FILENAME.1 $MICRO_LOG_FILENAME.2 etc.
if [ -e $MICRO_LOG_FILENAME ]; then
    rm $MICRO_LOG_FILENAME &> /dev/null
fi;

comments.body: We remove timestamps and log level info. It is also possible to output the whole log or create separete file for uart output and `cat` it here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +70,74 @@echo "LOGS:"
# Extract output from renode log
cat ${MICRO_LOG_FILENAME} |grep 'uartSemihosting' |sed 's/^.*from start] *//g'
if [ $exit_code -eq 0 ]
then
